author: lhazlewood
msg: SHIRO-127: re-work of LDAP support.  First initial commit - introduced two new classes, JndiLdapRealm and JndiLdapContextFactory that effectively supercede the now-deprecated AbstractLdapRealm and DefaultJndiContextFactory.  Test coverage for the new classes reaches 90% and 100% respectively.  We should be able to get to 100% once Authorization is flushed out.  Discussion to ensue on the list before this issue should be closed...
